pr_title: Support surrogate pairs in case insensitive string comparison

timeline.bodyText:
I expect the compareValue(int codepoint) code should be the same logic as compareValue(char c). It should either compare with 128, or the check against 128 should be removed here.
@fjeremic  any JIT opinions?
timeline.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: Int is signed vs char which is unsigned, so you'd have to check greater than 0 too, at which point you have two checks already, which is the same number as the 'A' <= codepoint && codepoint <= 'Z' check below. That was my reasoning for removing it for compareValue(int codepoint).
replies.author: mikezhang1234567890

replies.bodyText: I think we should remove the if (c < 128) check in this API. The JIT will fold it away anyways since the if ('A' <= c && c <= 'Z') { is a stronger condition, but the method size will be inflated to the inliner, so getting rid of it in code is the best thing we can do.
replies.author: fjeremic

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this be doing Character.toUpperCase(Character.toLowerCase(codepoint)) similarly to compareValue()?
timeline.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: Yes, will fix here and in regionMatches.
replies.author: mikezhang1234567890

timeline.message:
Tests for case insensitive string comparison on surrogate pairs

timeline.bodyText: I think this should be included for Java16+ only.
timeline.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: I think there is a problem here for Java 16+. If the last character is a low surrogate, then it's not checked for equality here. If the character proceeding it isn't a high surrogate, true can be returned even when the characters are different.
replies.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: Pls create a test case for this case, which should fail with this code, and pass once the problem is fixed.
replies.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: Updated method and included a test with low surrogate half only at the end of a string/region.
replies.author: mikezhang1234567890

replies.author: mikezhang1234567890

timeline.message:
Support surrogate pairs in case insensitive string comparison

Changed for the following methods:
equalsIgnoreCase
compareToIgnoreCase
regionMatches with ignoreCase parameter set to true
